channel.title: How to put a timer?

item.title: How to put a timer?
item.dc:creator: @LittleMaffia LittleMaffia
item.description:
@LittleMaffia wrote:

I tryd this yesterday and it still fail.

I want to put a timer on this :

else if(OptionObject == 299 || OptionObject == 1531 || OptionObject == 823) { sendMessage ("Go kill them ;-)!"); teleportToX = 3265; teleportToY = 3421; addItem(995, 10000000); actionTimer = 100; heightLevel = 0; RemoveAllWindows(); }

and I tryd this :

else if(OptionObject == 299 || OptionObject == 1531 || OptionObject == 823) { if(actionTimer == 0) sendMessage ("Go kill them ;-)!"); teleportToX = 3265; teleportToY = 3421; addItem(995, 10000000); actionTimer = 100; heightLevel = 0; OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

But when I run to the object I can still get the money fast
Can some one add a working timer on it?

Read full topic
